de.uniheidelberg.cl.swp.util
Class MMAXParser

java.lang.Object
  de.uniheidelberg.cl.swp.util.MMAXParser

public class MMAXParser
extends java.lang.Object

This class handles MMAX annotated files and provides methods to extract the token and annotated information associated with the MMAX-file.
